posts.post_title: Looking for t207s with Broadleaf or Anonymous backs...
posts.post_content:
Looking to get back into collecting t207s a bit.  Hoping for some lowgrade examples.  Since I'm starting from scratch here, just about any player will work!

Thanks guys,
